summary: Actor Forest Whitaker narrates the story of a group of inmate volunteers who staff their own hospice inside a maximum security prison in Louisiana where the average sentence is more than 90 years.
cast: Forest Whitaker|Burl Cain|Nolan James|Anthony Diggs|Steven Garner|Couertney Washington|Justin Granier|Ronald Ratliff|Anthony Middlebrooks Jr.|Stacye Falgout|Tracy Falgout|Sandy Netherland-Roberts|Charles Rodgers|Lane Nelson
title: Serving Life
